api_list.name: Get Amazon ProductDetails
api_list.description: get all desired amazon details of any product with this rest api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://first-appjs.p.rapidapi.com/products/B08PZ93179"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "first-appjs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://first-appjs.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "first-appjs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
